arts.ttl: Salford make history as they reach third round
Cheltenham Town fans' forum: Six credible applications in quest to find new investor
arts.sum: “Paul (Godfrey) a couple weeks back said Michael can you promise me that you’ll take the FA Cup serious, I said Paul have you seen my record so I know the importance of it, it’s a cup that I love, loved it growing up watching it, I loved playing in it and I’ve loved managing in it, so I think you supporters deserve it, to get a big team to come to town as Manchester City did a few years back.” “So, we made a fairly early decision about May, that we needed to try do something about that, we haven’t got to sell the club to survive, that’s not what it’s about, what we’re trying to do is find some investment so we can improve the club and make a better version of Cheltenham Town Football Club.”

arts.ttl: Preview: Salford City vs. Cheltenham Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's FA Cup clash between Salford City and Cheltenham Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
